title: How to get a Fortnite V-Bucks generator - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t. They are all fake. Believe me I actually tried once but pretty quickly I realised they are fake. Just don’t bother trying them. If you can’t buy any v bucks then you’ll just have to grind the free pass each season till you have 1000 so you can get the Battle Pass.
Buy Fortnite “Save the World” mode.Complete quests there (normal & dailies).Congrats, you now got yourself a V-Bucks generator.
